channel.title: BattleRune PK
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XdsCCKQ.png[/img]
[B][U][COLOR="#FFA500"]Navigation[/COLOR][/U][/B] Site: [url=http://www.battle-rune.com]www.battle-rune.com[/url] Webclient: Coming Soon Download Client: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/0apycxssd5jisp8/loader.jar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/0apycxssd5jisp8/loader.jar[/url] [/CENTER]
[LEFT] [COLOR="#FFA500"][B][U][SIZE=5]Developers[/SIZE][/U][/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*][B]Vayken[/B] [*][B]James[/B] [*][B]Kyle Fritz[/B][/ul]
[COLOR="#FFA500"][B][U][SIZE=5]Credits[/SIZE][/U][/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*][B]Bando[/B] [*][B]Graham[/B][/ul]
[COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=5][U][B]GamePlay[/B][/U][/SIZE][/COLOR] [B]This server is based on Kevlon, with alot of our own work put into it. This will be a Spawn server, however their will be Items that you can not spawn. Some items will be obtained by Pking and reciving tokens, Another way is when you get a PvP artifact mandrith will give you tickets you can use In his shop of Legends. Anthoer aspect of Battle-Rune is PvM(Bossing) some Items will be on a drop table, You will now be able to spawn these items either.[/B]
[COLOR="#FFA500"][B][U][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/U][/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*][B][COLOR="#008000"]Great Boss System[/COLOR][/B] [*][B][COLOR="#008000"]Spawn Server[/COLOR][/B] [*][B][COLOR="#008000"]90% Nex[/COLOR][/B] [*][B][COLOR="#008000"]Barrows Effects[/COLOR][/B] [*][B][COLOR="#008000"]100% Soaking[/COLOR][/B] [*][B][COLOR="#008000"]Autocasting[/COLOR][/B] [*][B][COLOR="#008000"]Mage, Range, Melee Void Effects[/COLOR][/B] [*][B][COLOR="#008000"]Clan Chat[/COLOR][/B] [*][COLOR="#FFA500"][B]Improve Combat[/B][/COLOR] [*][B][COLOR="#FFA500"]More To Come...[/COLOR][/B][/ul]
[B][U][COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=5]To Do[/SIZE][/COLOR][/U][/B]
[ul][*]More Summoning NPCs [*]More Summoning Specials [*]Pets [*]Artifact Exchange (Tickets) [*]PvP Artifacts [*]City Teleports [*]Improve Combat More. [*]Item restriction(Done, adding more items[/ul]
[/LEFT]
[CENTER] [SIZE=5][COLOR="#FFA500"]Media[/COLOR][/SIZE] [img]http://i.imgur.com/chiF7DN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TXFbLIm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dMfEWd7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/697pQTk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sFKfprF.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

[COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=5][U][B]GamePlay[/B][/U][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[B]This server is based on Kevlon, with alot of our own work put into it. This will be a Spawn server, however their will be Items that you can not spawn.
Some items will be obtained by Pking and reciving tokens, Another way is when you get a PvP artifact mandrith will give you tickets you can use In his shop of Legends.
Anthoer aspect of Battle-Rune is PvM(Bossing) some Items will be on a drop table, You will now be able to spawn these items either.[/B]
